South Korean pop rock band Day6 have released four studio albums, one live album, two compilation albums, seven extended plays and twenty-four singles.

## See also[edit]


* JYP Entertainment discography


## Notes[edit]


1. **^** Korean-language singles are digital downloads while Japanese-language singles are physical units, except noted.
2. **^**  "Days Gone By" appeared at number 96 on the Gaon Domestic Digital Chart.[34]

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.
